_header: Praise to God sorrowfully to forgive you your sin
_description: [Prayer?] in two verse lines and one long prose line

StPauls9Dxix.Transcription:
Prayes to god sorofuly to forgyff ȝow þour synPrayes to god
                    mekely to bryng ȝow to blys þat he is InPrayes to god hertly
                    þat he kep ȝow fro ȝowr enemysþat þay of ȝow
                    þe ouer hond ne w[yn? (lost in gutter)]
StPauls9Dxix.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.166.
